title: [Large-Scale] Virtual Pulmonary Rehabilitation Education Course for COVID-19 Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of the respiratory system
context.additional_context: Utilization of virtual educational content in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment.

learning_goals: Participants can explain three or more pulmonary rehabilitation exercise protocols for COVID-19 patients
Participants can analyze patient conditions using respiratory function assessment tools (e.g., Borg Scale)
Participants can apply methods for producing multimedia materials (videos, PPT) for patient education

resources: Neonatal respiratory rehabilitation practice video library

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
